channel.title: Server is being updated

item.title: Server is being updated
item.dc:creator: @Top_Glitch Top Glitch
item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

The EGUI is set to the Server’s Ip address; (I.e- servername.no-ip.biz) I put that into everything that had said serverip ect. Did the same for the client.java. But now, it only lets people connect using a different client. (Ip changer) This is both client and EGUI’s file below.;

public class EGUI { public static void main(String args[]) { client.main(new String[] { "epicpkzz.no-ip.biz", "", "" }); } }

CLIENT.JAVA NOW

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("epicpkzz.no-ip.biz", "43594"); method2(533, false, 795); }

[code] public static final void main(String args[])
{
try
{

        anInt957 = 0;
        anInt958 = 0;
        method52(false);//highmem
        aBoolean959 = true;//members
        signlink.storeid = 32;
        signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
        client client1 = new client();
        client1.method1(503, false, 765);
        setserver("epicpkzz.no-ip.biz", "43594");
        return[/code]
